publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3703 Angela Constance: Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project—That the Parliament congratulates the West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project on its excellent evaluation, demonstrating that the project has been very successful in engaging and making a significant difference to the lives of young people who have been looked after or are homeless; recognises the value of this service to the vulnerable young people of West Lothian who reported increased confidence and self-esteem, improved social and communication skills, increased enthusiasm and commitment to learning, improved team-building skills and increased feelings of self-worth due to the activities and support received from the project; congratulates the project in securing funding until March 2011, and wishes the project continued success. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*
S3M-3703 Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project (lodged on 13 March 2009) Elaine Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*, Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3703 Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project (lodged on 13 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3703 Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project (lodged on 13 March 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-3703 Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project (lodged on 13 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3703 Congratulations to West Lothian Youth Inclusion Project (lodged on 13 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
